name: Pocket Pets! (Poketto)
description:
Pocket Pets is a 2D Pet simulator game with a horror twist. What seems to be a harmless pet adoption center run by a kind Rabbit might be more than meets the eye.

The game is a work in progress so far you can only pick your pet and play one mini-game,  we will be updating the game to have more story and minigames.

*** There may be issues in scaling depending on screen size causing buttons to overlap, please play in full-screen mode and see if that fixes issues.
